roleset.name: stab literally in the back, or betray
roleset.note: BACKSTABBING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'stab.01'. (from backstabbing.01-n)

role.descr: stabbing instrument: knife or act of betrayal

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Wikileaks shows Meles' contempt for the South Sudanese and his backstabbing of Al-Bashir.
